export var stopScroll=function stopScroll(){document.body.style.overflow='hidden';};export var startScroll=function startScroll(){document.body.style.overflow='auto';};//https://javascript.ru/forum/jquery/15988-preobrazovanie-chisla-k-vidu-s-probelami.html
export var pasrePrice=function pasrePrice(pric){var price=String(pric);price+='';price=new Array(4-price.length%3).join('U')+price;return price.replace(/([0-9U]{3})/g,'$1 ').replace(/U/g,'');};
